Ground modifiers: 150% vs. Medium Aircraft, Aerial Fortresses Irkalla, Rocketeers, Gyrocopters, Cosmonauts and Scout Ravens
120% vs. Flak, Drone and Heavy Aircraft
100% vs. all infantry armor types and Drone
85% vs. (Big) Light Structure and ((Very) Big Defensive Structure
Air modifiers: 75% vs. Medium Aircraft, Rocketeers, Gyrocopters, Cosmonauts, Scout Ravens, Thor Gunships and Aerial Fortresses Irkalla
65% vs. Heavy Aircraft, Norio, Uragan, Hailjets, Ospreys, Hornet UAVs, Dybbuk-Interceptors, Quetzal drones, Leviathan drones and Shrike drones
Ability: Deploy to create a tornado for 655 frames (43.7 in-game seconds) that causes 10-3 damage every 2.25 frames (0.15 in-game seconds) in a radius of 3.7 around the Alanqa Skystation
The tornado is effective against infantry and aircraft but ineffective against vehicles and structures
The Alanqa Skystation cannot attack while generating the tornado
Has a cooldown of 660 frames (44 in-game seconds)
Notes: Causes 30-15 damage in a radius of 2 around where the Alanqa Skystation crashes when shot down
